body_html:
Maybe it would simplify to split this PR into 2:
There is the issue that debug builds don't compile - should be a nice, clean PR to fix this.

There is the other part in this PR to replace CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE with $(Configuration) which worries me a little because CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is defined by cmake where $(Configuration) is only known by Visual Studio and should not be in cmake ... the cmake generator for Visual Studio is supposed to deal with this. I normally don't switch the configuration in VS but just tried and it seems to be doing the right thing (cmake 3.8). CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is used consistently in the cmake files, including the external projects (like grpc), CI, ... so if it is changed the review and test are much more involved.
